mapper.select:
select
from score_cert where register_code = #{registerCode} and is_valid=1 and is_view_pic = 0 limit 0,1

select
from score_cert where register_code = #{registerCode} and is_valid=1
mapper.update: update score_cert set is_view_pic=1 where cert_code=#{certCode} and is_valid=1
mapper.select:
select
from score_cert where 1=1
and player_phone like CONCAT('%',#{playerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and cert_sn like CONCAT('%',#{certSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and cert_name like CONCAT('%',#{certName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and is_sms_send = #{isSmsSend}
and status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
